mapper.update: update exp_report set tesk_id = #{teskId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, student_user_id = #{studentUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, student_file_url = #{studentFileUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, score = #{score,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select er.id, er.tesk_id,et.title, er.student_user_id,u.name, er.content, er.student_file_url, er.update_time, er.score from exp_report er left join exp_tesk et on et.id = er.tesk_id left join users u on u.id = er.student_user_id where er.id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
